description:
Komeran Arashi is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch142873 [Otogi Morihito] and http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Wakatsuki Nico]. He is known for making snarky comments on various internet sites like twitter or YouTube.
Trivia: his name is a pun on the phrase kome-ran arashi コメ欄荒らし (with kome コメ being short for komento コメント `comment`) which can be translated as "comments section troll" (so a person trolling on the internet).
name: Komeran Arashi
